answerText: Tom Brady[10] The Patriots won the Super Bowl by defeating this team, which was led by quarterback Jake Delhomme and coached by John Fox at the time.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 9 | 11 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Answer the following about Super Bowl 38,  [10] This New England Patriots quarterback was named Super Bowl MVP. He had three touchdown passes during the game: one each to Deion Branch, David Givens, and Mike Vrabel.
